Description: Base of vessel applied to a Chian Sphinx and Lion Style pottery kernos; white slip; interior of vessel glazed streaky black; inside of base reserved with single horizontal band and bottom and trace of undetermined decoration; outside of base has alternating added red and black vertical tongues between horizontal bands.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.2188) (phase 2)
